import React, {Component} from 'react'; export default class About extends Component { render() { return (
ABOUT ME

An ambitious tech enthusiast with interest in Software Development and related Digital Technologies. My experience and passion stretch to fields that include designing, development and maintenance of Java based Web Applications and Digital Web Technologies within the Digital Marketing arena.

PERSONAL INFO

Address: 48 Onderste Street, Krugersdorp

Email: mukwindidzacp@gmail.com

Phone: 074 867 8735 / 011 660 1557

Main Language: English

Second Language: French

Third Language: Shona

); } }
